review: Such a great purchase! It's so much fun to use when having a party and you're not sure what to do with your guests. The games available for purchase on it are so much fun!
author: Kelly Zdanowicz

review: We are still adding apps but are very pleased with our purchase. We formerly accessed Amazon Prime video and Netflix through a Nintendo Wii. We didn't access them very often because this required a very awkward maneuver with the Nintendo remote. Not so with the Fire stick, which I installed myself without difficulty. We have also added Pandora and ITune Radio aops. We have previously accessed these services on other devices. With the new accessibility, we will likely cancel our premium movie channels on Direct TV and may ultimately "cut the cord" entirely.
